meta.title: Data-driven Apps made easy with Vert.x 3.4.0 and headless CMS Gentics Mesh
meta.summary: I would like to share why Vert.x is not only a robust foundation for the headless Content Management System Gentics Mesh but also how it can be used to build a template-based web server.

meta.title: Vert.x 3.4.0.Beta1 release
meta.summary: We have released 3.4.0.Beta1, this release is the biggest since Vert.x 3.0.0 with plenty of great features.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.
